++Tiger Woman
Negro, her head was that of a saber tooth tiger, and its stripes covered her breasts and her back. Yellow eyes. Her skin was blue black, and she wore bangles of ivory around her upper arms and knees. She wore a skirt of tiger skin and pelt as cape. In her left hand was a harp like stringed instrument. The pelt was held closed by a complicated clasp that appeared to be gold tree set with coloured stones. She is one of the creators of the song lines

Name: Stalking Tiger
*Consort of* [[WolfMan]]
